page.title: 13COMMUNICATIONS FORRES EAST
page.content: Not transport Includes telecommunications, postal services, etc, not by computer. Forres has both telephone and postal services as it is a reasonably large town. It also has a teletext service. {POSTAL SERVICE The main post office in Forres is in the West end but there is a small sub post office at the rear of a newsagents shop, in the east end of the high street. Each day there are two postal deliveries. One is fairly early, it comes around nine o'clock. There is another delivery which comes at around eleven o'clock. Parcels are delivered at about twelve o'clock. The east end of Forres has a telephone system which is in all houses but there is no telephone exchange at this end.
